knotted.translation[0].definitions[0].de: tied in a knot or in several knots
knotted.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a knotted handkerchief on his head
knotted.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a muscle or other part of your body is knotted, it feels tight and uncomfortable
knotted.translation[0].definitions[2].de: knotted hands or fingers are twisted because of old age or too much work
